name: Avocado Social
description:
Social media can be confusing and overwhelming, but done right it can make a huge difference to your business and instantly get you in front of your target customer. We set up Avocado Social to provide practical advice and proven strategies to startups, growing businesses and big brands. Our aim is to empower you to use social media effectively. We coach businesses on the most important tactics for growing their online communities, without complicated jargon or vague theories.
We regularly hold public workshops, as well as offering bespoke in house training and one to one coaching allowing us to work with businesses at every stage. We’ve worked with Tesco, the BBC, Cancer Research UK, Cabana and EDF Energy, as well as numerous startups including Freida’s Pantry and SendOwl. We’re proud of our consistently glowing feedback, being there for our clients is what we do best.
